channel.title: employees on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in employees on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-02
item.description: DoorDash isn’t just delivering meals—it’s making them, too (3 minute read) DoorDash is opening a temporary kitchen to make meals for six restaurants in San Jose, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-16
item.description: Square to Create a New Bitcoin Platform for Financial Services (1 minute read) Square is building an open developer platform to make it easier to provide non-custodial, decentralized financial services.
